document_data.name: Flaheerta
document_data.mainbody:
'''Flaheerta''' was an inhabitant of the city of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|I saw you fighting those monsters! You were magnificent! I think. I mean, I couldn't really see from where I was - but I bet you were!|Flaheerta}}
document_data.Description: Flaheerta was a [[half-elven]] woman with skin the hue of wood and bronze. She had light hazel eyes and dark brown hair gathered in a bun. She wore red [[wizard]]ly [[robe]]s.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Flaheerta could be found in the docks of the [[Baldur's Gate/Lower City|Lower City]] of Baldur's Gate, where commoners could buy fresh [[fish]]. The docks were attacked by a band of [[sahuagin]] when the area was visited by the [[Absolute Adversaries]], if was unknown if Flaheerta survived the attack.
